# Goal

**Extends:** [Resource](../Resource)

## Description

A goal in the notepad hint system

## Property Descriptions

### id

```gdscript
export var id = 0
```

The numeric id of this goal

```gdscript

```

The title of the goal

### hints

```gdscript

```

A list of hints

### hints\_fulfilled

```gdscript
export var hints_fulfilled = []
```

The last hint currently visible
